rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with ample natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows. Adheres to Vastu by aligning the entrance in a direction that invites positivity.
An expansive living area featuring large windows for abundant natural light and ventilation. Designed with Vastu principles to ensure energy flow.
A comfortable dining space adjacent to the kitchen area, facilitating family interaction.
A modern kitchen layout with floor-to-ceiling windows for brightness and a view of the garden. Vastu compliant placement ensures efficient energy flow.
Multipurpose space that can be used as a family room or study area, incorporating natural light and ventilation.
A guest bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and an attached balcony for relaxation and fresh air. Vastu principles emphasize placement to promote restful energy.
A functional guest bathroom adjacent to the guest bedroom for convenience.

openings.features: Floor-to-ceiling glass door, designed according to Vastu and local norms.
Spacious balconies with floor-to-ceiling windows providing outdoor access and natural ventilation.

notes.vastu_considerations: Key Vastu alignments include the entrance facing a favourable direction, placement of the kitchen in an area that receives morning sunlight, and ensuring clear pathways for energy flow.
notes.local_building_norms: Design adheres to local Indian building codes with reinforced structural elements for a farmhouse on a 60x90 feet plot. The design is optimized for climate and cultural context.
